prompt: two little boys sitting on the couch playing vidiogames

scenes.description: Two young boys, Alex and Ben, sit on a worn-out couch, deeply engrossed in a video game.  The couch is a light beige with faded fabric; visible wear and tear on cushions are obvious. Sunlight streams into the room from a nearby window; a clear sky and bright, sharp light outside contrast with softer illumination indoors. The scene's tone is calm, relaxed and comfortable; indicative of an intimate family atmosphere.

objects.name: Couch
objects.description: Name: Couch, Size: 6 feet long, 3 feet wide, Material: Fabric, Color: Beige (faded), Condition: Worn, Placement: Center of the room, cushions somewhat sunken., Visual details that must remain consistent: Its faded color and visible wear and tear

Name: Video game controller, Size: 6 inches long, 3 inches wide, Material: Plastic, Color: Black and grey, Condition: Intact, Placement: Alex holds one; Ben the other, both gripped firmly in excited, focused hands. Visual details that must remain consistent: Buttons and joystick locations
objects.name: Video Game Controller
Video Game Console
objects.description: Name: Video Game Console, Size: 12 inches by 10 inches, Material: Plastic, Color: Black with a logo and some led lighting indicators, Condition: Good, Placement: on the floor under the couch, next to a power cable

characters.name: Alex
characters.description: Name: Alex, Height: 3.5 feet, Build: Slender, Hairstyle: Short, spiky, Hair color: Brown, Skin tone: Light, Facial features: Bright eyes, small nose, Clothing:  White t-shirt with a small cartoon print, blue shorts, white socks with blue stripes, and blue sneakers., Accessories or distinguishing details: None, Facial expressions and emotions: Focused and happy

characters.name: Ben
characters.description: Name: Ben, Height: 3 feet, Build: Slightly chubby, Hairstyle: Short, slightly wavy, Hair color: Blond, Skin tone: Fair, Facial features: Round face, big smile, Clothing: Gray t-shirt, dark blue jeans, red socks with white stripes, and black sneakers., Accessories or distinguishing details: None, Facial expressions and emotions: Excited and enthusiastic
